p: Since the 1997/98 epidemic, on average, hospitalization was requested by the GP for 0.3% of ILI cases by epidemic (min = 0.1% in 2000/01, max = 0.6% in 2006/07), and for 2.1% of elderly ILI cases (≥65 years). There was no evidence of temporal trend from 1997/98 to 2016/17. However, hospitalization was more often requested for elderly during epidemics dominated by A(H3N2) (2.7%, IC 95% 2.3; 3.2 vs 1.2%, IC 95% 0.5; 1.9, P value < 10 −6).
